programme.title: Judge Mom
programme.desc: Kira is suing Daniel because he lost her handbag and its contents; she says Daniel couldn't remember taking her purse and didn't know where it was; Daniel says he's not a handbag babysitter and she should have been responsible for her own property.

programme.title: Glory and Honor
programme.desc: Upon returning from the North Pole, black Matthew Henson (Delroy Lindo) is not treated as well as his white partner (Henry Czerny), Robert Peary.

programme.title: Freedom Song
programme.desc: Against his father's (Danny Glover) wishes, a black teen (Vondie Curtis-Hall) joins a crusade to desegregate his small Mississippi town.

programme.title: Ghosts of Mississippi
programme.desc: A Mississippi prosecutor (Alec Baldwin) and the widow (Whoopi Goldberg) of Medgar Evers crusade to retry a white racist (James Woods) for the 1963 murder of the NAACP leader.

programme.title: Getting Played
programme.desc: Three friends (Carmen Electra, Stacey Dash, Vivica A. Fox) play a game of seduction on a stranger (Bill Bellamy), but the tables are turned when he finds out about the joke.

programme.title: Collateral Beauty
programme.desc: When a successful New York advertising executive (Will Smith) experiences a deep personal tragedy and retreats from life entirely, his colleagues devise a drastic plan to force him to confront his grief in a surprising and profoundly human way.
